title: Uses of Prostaglandins
author: ayobami
description: let's check out the uses of various prostaglandin analogues in healthcare with this mini-quiz

questions.question: A
questions.answer: reduction of intra-orbital pressure in glaucoma

questions.question: B
questions.answer: expulsion of uterine contents, treatment of postpartum hemmorage

questions.question: C
questions.answer: erectile dysfunction, maintainance of a patent ductus arteriosus

questions.question: D
questions.answer: mainly for gastroproctection from NSAID-induced gastric ulcers, also for expulsion of uterine contents

questions.question: E
questions.answer: treatment of pulmonary arterial hypertension by vasodilation
